dataset.title: Total numbers and species of insects taken from the Kuparuk River rock scrubbings during the summer of 1990, Arctic LTER 1990.

abstract.para: Total numbers and species of insects taken from the Kuparuk River rock scrubbings during the summer of 1990.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications

A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:
Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Near the Toolik Lake Research Station, approximately 1 km upstream and 2 km downstream of where the Kuparuk River crosses the Dalton Highway in arctic Alaska.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: Jul91 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME:Julie Pallant DATE:1Oct91

para.literalLayout: A rock-scrubbing sampling technique was used to collect samples at several different stations, with two replicates at each station on three different dates. The same sampling procedure was used for all dates. The stations were measured relative to the site of the dripper ("-" = upstream of the dripper). The samples were preserved in ethanol then picked, sorted, counted, and measured in Duluth using a digitizing pad.
Notes: *** All insect numbers are larval counts unless noted otherwise. ***

Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE Kuparuk River y DATE date DDMMMYY n STATION distance from dripper meters n SAMPLE repetition number 1 or 2 n TOTBF number of TOTal number of black flies n BRACHY number of brachycentrus n ORTHOCLA number of orthocladius n BAETIS number of baetis n RHYACOPH number of rhyacophila n CHIRON number of chironomids n BRAPUPA number of brachycentrus pupae n NATARSIA number of natarsia n CHIRPUPA number of chironomid pupae n BAET SP3 number of baetis "species 3" n CINYGM number of cinygmula n SB FLY number of small black flies n LB FLY number of large black flies n BF PUPA number of black fly pupae n COMMENTS notes about data n (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
